items.title: If Nifty Bank breaks this resistance then it could move to 53k; details
items.description: The Nifty Bank Index is currently trading in a defined range of 51,825 to 50,200. A breakout above or below this range will provide a clear direction for traders

items.title: Cochin Shipyard sinks 5% after Govt plans to sell stake worth Rs 2,026 cr
items.description: Shares of Cochin Shipyard fell as much as 4.90 per cent at Rs 1,590 per share on the BSE in Wednesday's intraday day trade.

items.title: HDFC AMC rallies 5% on strong Q2 results; market cap touches Rs 1 trillion
items.description: At 09:29 am; with Rs 1.02 trillion market cap, HDFC AMC was trading 4.9 per cent higher at Rs 4,772.50, as compared to 0.18 per cent decline in the BSE Sensex.

items.title: KEI Industries shares drop 7% on reporting lower Q2 profit, Ebitda margins

items.title: Bank of Maharashtra shares soar over 2% on healthy Q2FY25 results
items.description: The Pune-based lender's NII expanded 15.41 per cent YoY to Rs 2,807 crore in Q2 FY25 compared to Rs 2,432 crore in the corresponding quarter of the previous fiscal year
